about_the_game:
🔥 Falos Chemistry - Learn Chemistry the FUN Way! 🔥

Get ready to jump, run, and fly your way to becoming a chemistry pro! 🎮 Falos Chemistry is a super fun game that teaches you the basics of chemistry while you play. No boring lessons here—just awesome games that help you learn!

🚀 4 Amazing Mini-Games:

  • Jumping Gorilla 🦍: Hop through levels and learn atomic weights!
  • Running Gorilla 🦍: Run fast and memorize electron configurations!
  • Dragon Snake 🐍: Slither and master elemental symbols!
  • Bird 🐦: Flap your way to chemistry victory!

🎓 What You'll Learn: Discover the building blocks of chemistry, like atomic weight, electron configurations, and elemental symbols, all while having a blast!

Whether you’re just starting or need a refresher, Falos Chemistry makes learning easy and exciting. Perfect for anyone who loves games and wants to get better at chemistry. 🧪💥

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Falos Chemistry

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Falos Chemistry is a simple, fun game where you play different mini-games like jumping, running, and flying while learning easy chemistry basics. You'll pick up atomic weights, electron setups, and element symbols as you play. Great for anyone who wants to learn while having fun!
